document_title: Korean Post-Quantum Cryptography Competition Final Results
short_description: Korea selects HAETAE and AIMer (signatures) plus SMAUG-T and NTRU+ (KEMs) as national PQC standards. Target standardization by 2029 migration by 2035.
authors_or_organization: KISA; Ministry of Science and ICT; NIS Korea

document_title: FIPS 140-3 Implementation Guidance for Post-Quantum Cryptography
short_description: Updated FIPS 140-3 Implementation Guidance adding self-test requirements for FIPS 203/204/205 PQC algorithms and new guidance for Key Encapsulation Mechanisms.

document_title: Study on Preparing for Transition to Post Quantum Cryptography in 3GPP
short_description: 3GPP study on integrating standalone or hybrid PQC algorithms into existing 5G security protocols. References TR 33.938 Cryptographic Inventory.
dependencies: TR 33.938; NIST PQC; IETF PQC RFCs

document_title: Open Quantum Safe liboqs Library v0.15.0
short_description: Latest liboqs release with updated PQC algorithm implementations including NIST-standardized ML-KEM ML-DSA and SLH-DSA. Part of Linux Foundation PQCA.
authors_or_organization: Open Quantum Safe; Linux Foundation PQCA

document_title: TPM 2.0 Post-Quantum Cryptography Library Specification
short_description: TPM 2.0 Library updates incorporating PQC algorithms with hybrid classical+PQ support. Aligns with TPM 2.0 V1.85 standard updated July 2025.
applicable_industries: Hardware Security; IoT; Embedded Systems; Enterprise

document_title: Module-Lattice-Based Key-Encapsulation Mechanism Standard (ML-KEM)
short_description: Specifies ML-KEM (Kyber) with three parameter sets (512, 768, 1024) for quantum-resistant key establishment. Errata Oct 2024.
applicable_industries: Generic IT; Finance; Telecom; Government; Healthcare; Critical Infrastructure
ProtocolOrToolImpact: TLS 1.3, QUIC, SSH, IPsec/IKE, CMS key wrapping

document_title: Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Standard (ML-DSA)
short_description: Specifies ML-DSA (Dilithium) signature algorithms with three parameter sets (44, 65, 87). Errata Oct 2024.
applicable_industries: IT; Finance; Telecom; Government; Identity Management
ProtocolOrToolImpact: X.509 certificates, TLS authentication, code signing, document signature

document_title: Stateless Hash-Based Digital Signature Standard (SLH-DSA)
short_description: Specifies SLH-DSA (SPHINCS+) stateless hash-based signatures with 12 parameter sets.
applicable_industries: Firmware; Critical Infrastructure; Software Updates; Long-term Archival
ProtocolOrToolImpact: CMS signatures, software signing, long-term archival signing

document_title: FFT over NTRU-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Algorithm (FN-DSA)
short_description: Specifies FN-DSA (FALCON) compact signature algorithm with two parameter sets (512, 1024). Currently in public draft stage; final standard expected in 2026. Offers significantly smaller signatures than ML-DSA, suited for constrained environments.
applicable_industries: Constrained Devices; IoT; Embedded Systems; Mobile

document_title: Digital Signature Standard (DSS)
short_description: Specifies RSA, ECDSA, EdDSA. Removes DSA. Errata May 2025. Transition to PQC planned.

document_title: Recommendation for Stateful Hash-Based Signature Schemes
short_description: Specifies LMS and XMSS stateful hash-based signature schemes for firmware signing.
applicable_industries: Firmware; Embedded Systems; IoT; Boot Security

document_title: Recommendations for Key-Encapsulation Mechanisms
short_description: Guidance for implementing KEMs securely including hybrid KEMs and FIPS 140 validation requirements.
applicable_industries: IT; Finance; Gov; Cloud; HSM Vendors

document_title: Transition to Post-Quantum Cryptography Standards
short_description: Roadmap for transitioning to PQC. Proposes 2030 deprecation and 2035 disallowment of classical asymmetric crypto.

document_title: Status Report on the Fourth Round of the NIST PQC Standardization Process
short_description: Documents HQC selection as fourth PQC standard providing code-based cryptographic diversity.

document_title: Hamming Quasi-Cyclic (HQC) Algorithm Specification
short_description: Code-based KEM selected March 2025 as backup to ML-KEM. Draft FIPS expected 2026, final 2027.

document_title: Using Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM) Algorithms in CMS
short_description: Defines CMS KEMRecipientInfo structure for PQ KEMs including ML-KEM.
applicable_industries: IT; Email; Web PKI; Secure Messaging

document_title: Use of the HSS/LMS Hash-Based Signature Algorithm in CMS
short_description: Updated HSS/LMS usage in CMS. Obsoletes RFC 8708.

document_title: Terminology for Post-Quantum Traditional Hybrid Schemes
short_description: Defines terminology for PQ/T hybrid schemes including composite KEMs and signatures.

document_title: Use of HSS and XMSS Hash-Based Signature Algorithms in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines OIDs and certificate structures for stateful hash-based signatures in X.509.

document_title: Certificate Management Protocol (CMP) Updates for KEM
short_description: Adds KEM key transport to CMP. Obsoletes RFC 4210.

document_title: Use of SLH-DSA in CMS
short_description: Defines SPHINCS+ (SLH-DSA) usage in Cryptographic Message Syntax.

document_title: LMS Algorithm Identifiers for Alternative Hash Functions
short_description: Extends RFC 8554 with SHA-3 and SHAKE hash function options for LMS.

document_title: Use of ML-DSA in CMS
short_description: Defines ML-DSA (Dilithium) usage in CMS for document and message signing.
applicable_industries: Email; Messaging; JAR signing; Document Signing

document_title: Hybrid key exchange in TLS 1.3
short_description: Framework for hybrid key exchange combining traditional and PQ algorithms in TLS 1.3.

document_title: Post-quantum hybrid ECDHE-MLKEM Key Agreement for TLSv1.3
short_description: Specifies X25519MLKEM768 SecP256r1MLKEM768 and SecP384r1MLKEM1024 hybrid groups for TLS 1.3. Updated to Standards Track category with normative hybrid framework and RFC 9847 references. Expires Aug 2026.

document_title: ML-KEM Post-Quantum Key Agreement for TLS 1.3
short_description: Defines ML-KEM-512 ML-KEM-768 and ML-KEM-1024 as NamedGroups for pure PQ key agreement in TLS 1.3. WGLC issues identified requiring revision. Expires Aug 2026.

document_title: Post-quantum Hybrid Key Exchange with ML-KEM in IKEv2
short_description: Specifies ML-KEM in IKEv2 for quantum-resistant VPN and IPsec key establishment.

document_title: Hybrid Post-quantum Key Exchange SM2-MLKEM for TLSv1.3
short_description: Defines curveSM2MLKEM768 hybrid for TLS 1.3 combining Chinese SM2 curve with ML-KEM.

document_title: Algorithm Identifiers for ML-KEM in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines X.509 OIDs and structures for ML-KEM public keys in certificates.

document_title: Algorithm Identifiers for ML-DSA in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines X.509 OIDs and certificate structures for ML-DSA (Dilithium) signatures. Supersedes draft-ietf-lamps-dilithium-certificates.

document_title: Composite ML-KEM for Use in X.509 PKI and CMS
short_description: Composite (classical+PQC) KEM combining RSA-OAEP/ECDH/X25519/X448 with ML-KEM for X.509 and CMS. In WG Last Call. Expires July 2026.

document_title: Composite ML-DSA for Use in X.509 PKI and CMS
short_description: Composite signatures combining RSA/ECDSA/Ed25519 with ML-DSA for hybrid PKI. In IETF Last Call with SECDIR and GENART reviews. Expires July 2026.

document_title: Use of ML-KEM in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)
short_description: ML-KEM in CMS using KEMRecipientInfo from RFC 9629. Submitted to IESG and in RFC Editor Queue as RFC 9936 (AUTH48 stage).

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography in OpenPGP
short_description: PQC for OpenPGP: composite ML-KEM+ECC encryption composite ML-DSA+ECC signatures and standalone SLH-DSA. Submitted to IESG for publication as Proposed Standard. Expires July 2026.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography for Engineers
short_description: Practical guidance for engineers implementing PQC algorithms and protocols.

document_title: Hybrid signature spectrums
short_description: Alternative approach for composing classic and PQ signature algorithms with different security properties.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Recommendations for TLS-based Applications
short_description: Best practices for implementing quantum-ready usage profiles in TLS-based applications.

document_title: Guidance for migration to Post-Quantum Cryptography
short_description: Migration guidance covering challenges, anti-patterns, and best practices for PQC transition.

document_title: KEM based Authentication for IKEv2 with Post-quantum Security
short_description: Specifies KEM-based authentication for IKEv2 as more efficient alternative to ML-DSA.

document_title: Quantum-Safe Hybrid Key Exchanges
short_description: Framework for hybrid ECDH + ML-KEM with standard key combiners (concatenation, HKDF).

document_title: Migration Strategies and Recommendations for Quantum-Safe Schemes
short_description: Strategic guidance for transitioning to quantum-safe cryptography.

document_title: Commercial National Security Algorithm Suite 2.0
short_description: US government adoption requirements for ML-KEM-1024, ML-DSA-87, SLH-DSA, LMS/XMSS. Level 5 recommended.

document_title: CNSA 2.0 Frequently Asked Questions
short_description: FAQ document with implementation timelines: 2025-2030 prefer, 2030-2033 exclusive, 2035 complete.

document_title: CSfC Post Quantum Cryptography Guidance Addendum
short_description: Guidance for implementing PQC in Commercial Solutions for Classified (CSfC) programs.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations and Key Lengths
short_description: German federal recommendations including ML-KEM ML-DSA SLH-DSA XMSS LMS FrodoKEM Classic McEliece. Version 2026-01. Expanded PQC KEM and signature recommendations.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations for TLS
short_description: TLS-specific PQC recommendations including hybrid key exchange. Version 2026-01.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations for IPsec
short_description: IPsec/IKEv2-specific PQC recommendations. Version 2026-01.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations for SSH
short_description: SSH-specific PQC recommendations for secure remote access. Version 2026-01.

document_title: ANSSI Views on Post-Quantum Cryptography Transition
short_description: French national guidance mandating hybrid approach for products requiring security beyond 2030.

document_title: ANSSI Views on Post-Quantum Cryptography Transition (2023 Follow-up)
short_description: Updated guidance on hybridization requirements and timeline phases through 2030+.

document_title: Recommendation on Coordinated Implementation Roadmap for PQC Transition
short_description: EU-wide coordination framework for member state PQC transitions. Target 2030 for critical systems.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography: Current State and Quantum Mitigation
short_description: ENISA recommendations on PQC adoption strategy for European organizations.

document_title: EU Cybersecurity Certification Agreed Cryptographic Mechanisms v2.0
short_description: Includes PQC algorithms in Agreed Cryptographic Mechanisms for EUCC certification.

document_title: Preparing for Quantum-Safe Cryptography
short_description: UK guidance on PQC migration with 2035 deadline for full transition.

document_title: Migration to Post-Quantum Cryptography (Preliminary Draft)
short_description: Practical guidance for enterprise PQC migration with use cases and reference architectures.

document_title: Hash-based Digital Signatures
short_description: Standardizes XMSS and LMS stateful hash-based signatures at ISO level.

document_title: Asymmetric Encryption Algorithms
short_description: ISO standard for asymmetric encryption. Updates planned for PQC KEMs.

document_title: Lightweight Cryptography - Part 8: Post-Quantum Algorithms
short_description: Standardization of lightweight PQC algorithms for constrained devices.

document_title: Technical Specification for Quantum Key Distribution Products
short_description: Chinese cryptographic industry standard for QKD products using deceptive state BB84.

document_title: Basic Requirements for Quantum Secure Communication Applications
short_description: Chinese national standard defining requirements for quantum secure communication systems.

document_title: Quantum Communication Terms and Definitions
short_description: Standardizes terminology for quantum communication in China.

document_title: Quantum Key Distribution System Technical Requirements - Part 1
short_description: Technical requirements for QKD systems based on BB84 protocol.

document_title: Chinese Post-Quantum Cryptography Competition Winners
short_description: Results of CACR national PQC competition: Aigi-sig, LAC.PKE, Aigis-enc (lattice-based).

reference_id: China ICCS PQC Call for Proposals
document_title: ICCS Post-Quantum Cryptography Algorithm Solicitation
short_description: Chinese initiative for independent PQC algorithms for public-key crypto, hash functions, block ciphers.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Evaluation Report
short_description: Japanese evaluation of NIST PQC algorithms and recommendations for Japanese adoption.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Readiness Guide
short_description: Singapore guidance for organizations preparing for PQC transition.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Roadmap
short_description: Australian guidance with aggressive 2030 deadline for PQC migration.

document_title: Guidance on Post-Quantum Cryptography
short_description: Canadian Centre for Cyber Security guidance on PQC adoption.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Integration in Mobile Networks
short_description: Guidance for integrating PQC into TLS, IKE, and 5G infrastructure.

document_title: Post-Quantum Algorithm Requirements for Public Trust Certificates
short_description: CA/Browser Forum requirements for ML-DSA certificates in Web PKI.

document_title: Security Services for Applications and Management Messages - PQC Update
short_description: IEEE vehicular communications security standard update for PQC.

document_title: Security Architecture and Procedures for 5G - PQC Enhancements
short_description: 5G security architecture updates incorporating PQC algorithms.

document_title: XMSS: eXtended Merkle Signature Scheme
short_description: Specifies XMSS stateful hash-based signatures for long-term security.

document_title: Leighton-Micali Hash-Based Signatures
short_description: Specifies LMS/HSS stateful hash-based signature schemes.

document_title: Multiple Key Exchanges in IKEv2
short_description: Framework for up to 7 additional KEMs in IKEv2 for PQ/T hybrid approaches.

document_title: Mixing Preshared Keys in IKEv2 for Post-quantum Security
short_description: Defines Post-quantum Preshared Keys (PPK) for quantum-resistant IKEv2.

document_title: CISA PQC Product Category List (Updated per EO 14306)
short_description: Updated product category list per Executive Order 14306. Identifies cloud services web software networking hardware endpoint security as PQC-ready categories. Developed with NSA. Products must support PQC for key establishment and digital signatures.

document_title: Samsung/Thales Post-Quantum Embedded Secure Element (S3SSE2A)
short_description: Samsung System LSI and Thales bring ML-KEM quantum-resistant capabilities to embedded Secure Element (eSE). Two dedicated PQC hardware accelerators 18x faster than software. CES Best Cybersecurity Innovation Award winner. EAL6+ certification target. Crypto-agile architecture.
applicable_industries: IoT; Embedded Systems; Mobile; Hardware Security

document_title: Efficient Quantum-Safe Hybrid Key Exchanges with Hidden Access Policies (Covercrypt)
short_description: Defines KEMAC (Key Encapsulation Mechanism with Access Control) scheme called Covercrypt. Provides pre- and post-quantum security through hybridization with precise data access control. Encapsulation and decapsulation in hundreds of microseconds.
applicable_industries: Data Protection; Cloud; Enterprise; Access Control

document_title: Post-quantum Hybrid Key Exchange in IKEv2 with FrodoKEM
short_description: Specifies FrodoKEM as additional KEM for IKEv2 hybrid key exchange. Unstructured lattice-based KEM providing conservative security. WG adoption call ending Feb 2026.

document_title: Use of the FN-DSA Signature Algorithm in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)
short_description: Defines FN-DSA (FALCON/FIPS 206) signature usage in CMS. Expires May 2026.

document_title: FN-DSA for JOSE and COSE
short_description: Defines FN-DSA (FALCON) algorithm identifiers and serialization for JSON Object Signing and Encryption (JOSE) and CBOR Object Signing and Encryption (COSE).

document_title: Executive Order 14306 - Strengthening the Nation's Cybersecurity (PQC Provisions)
short_description: Trump administration EO directing DHS/CISA to publish PQC product categories. Requires TLS 1.3 adoption by 2030. Amends EO 13694 and EO 14144. Retains PQC migration provisions from Biden era.

document_title: CA/Browser Forum Ballot SMC013 - Enable PQC Algorithms for S/MIME
short_description: Enables ML-DSA post-quantum digital signatures in S/MIME certificates. IPR Exclusion period completed with no notices filed. Adopted August 22 2025.
